Articles.Content:
Is the drag on KSP wings correct ?? They seem Over Powered, ie can fly on their own. Do they even have a cross section ??

Edited October 7, 2013 by Lohan2008
The fact that the game's aerodynamic model is a bit unrealistic has been known and discussed for quite a while now. I know Ferram Aerospace Research tries to make things a little more realistic.
FAR does an excellent job, and I say that from the perspective of someone who has flown jet flight sims and knows what the flight model is supposed to feel like.

FAR does an excellent job, and I say that from the perspective of someone who has flown jet flight sims and knows what the flight model is supposed to feel like.

I can't build a working plane in KSP without FAR.
